    {% block content %}

    Named Entity Extraction

    The main goal of this system is to extract the named entity in a document given in parameter.

    A named entity extraction can be :

    • person names
    • organization
    • locations
    • times expressions
    • quantities
    • monetary values
    • percentages
    • products
    • date
    • language

    {% endblock %}
